titleStmt.title: A Collection of poems written upon several occasions by several persons with many additions, never before in print.
titleStmt.author: Sedley, Charles, Sir, 1639?-1701. Poems. Selections. 1673.
Etherege, George, Sir, 1635?-1691. Poems. Selections. 1673.
Buckingham, John Sheffield, Duke of, 1648-1720 or 21. Poems. Selections. 1673.
Behn, Aphra, 1640-1689. Poems. Selections. 1673.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Tho. Collins and John Ford ... and Will. Cademan ...,

notesStmt.note: Poems by Charles Sedley, George Etherege, John Sheffield Buckingham, Aphra Behn, and others.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Cf. Case, A.E. Poetical miscellanies, 1935, p. 100.
